Here's a recent talk I've given regarding why we pay attention to accessibility, and how the accessibility-related practices at Cayuse have changed in the past year.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rucBlvKpSUo

Just as our customers have a responsibility to provide accessible tools to their employees, Cayuse has a responsibility to deliver accessible software to our customers. In this session, we'll discuss how accessibility practice is changing at Cayuse, the accessibility status of our products, and what weâ€™re doing to continuously improve.
